1.Name: Emoji
1.Text: * Did you know the earth is [wave]flat?

2.Name: Dezzy
2.Text: * kind of how the sky is red!

3.Name: Emoji
3.Text: * Ready to join the flat earth community?

3.Name: Emoji
3.Text:
* with enough arguing agaist guys in the internet 
	 I can asure you we'll debunk the lies of those globe heads

4.Text:
* No its not you tinfoil hat, no life,
	  basement dweller

5.Text: * Oh dont worry it will be once I run you over

5.Name: Dezzy
5.Text:
* You know holding a gun that can launch you to space? 
 try anything and you see whos right

6.Name: Godot icon
6.Text: * did you know the earth is-

6.Text:
* Im going to stop you right there

7.Text:
